long_description: Delivering crisp, precise shifts for your double- or triple-chainring Shimano drivetrain, the Shimano SLX SL-M670 10-speed shifters offer solid performance at a reasonable price. 2-way release trigger design lets you shift with either a push or pull of your thumb or finger-it's up to you. Optical gear displays float above the handlebar for easy clamp setting; displays are removable. Shifters are compatible with 10-speed rear derailleurs and convert to work with either triple or double 10-speed front derailleurs. SLX SL-M670 10-Speed shifters are part of the Dyna-Sys group of components from Shimano and is compatible with other Dyna-Sys parts; for use with HG-X 10-speed drivetrains. Includes shift cable/housing set; please note: these shifters do not include brake levers.
short_description: Delivering crisp, precise shifts for your double- or triple-chainring Shimano drivetrain, the Shimano SLX SL-M670 10-speed shifters offer solid performance at a reasonable price.
